title: vaarija nayanaa
sahitya:
vArija nayana nI vADanu varamunanu brOvu

caraNam 1

 svalpa phaladulagu vElpulu Ecina alpuDanucu nannandaru balkina
   
caraNam 2

 sarivAralu I bAdhalO navvina pari pari vitamula bAdhalu prTTina
   
caraNam 3

 kaSTamu rAni iSTamu rAni duSTuDanucu nanu dUrina gAni
   
caraNam 4

 pApula nApai mOpina nEramu shrIpati nIpada cintanE gAni
   
caraNam 5

 bAguga nIvE bhAgyamu gAni rAga rahita tyAgarAja vinuta harE
